---
id: resolve-translations
title: "Resolve all translations for a language"
description: "Resolves all translations for a language by merging custom and default values; returns 200 even when only defaults exist (404 only if neither custom nor default exists for the requested scope)."
sidebar_label: "Resolve all translations for a language"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/apis/i18n/thunder-i-18-n-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Resolve all translations for a language"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/i18n/languages/{language}/translations/resolve"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Resolves all translations for a language by merging custom and default values; returns 200 even when only defaults exist (404 only if neither custom nor default exists for the requested scope).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"namespace","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Filter translations by namespace.","schema":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$","example":"auth"}},{"name":"language","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Language tag in BCP 47 format (e.g., `en`, `es`, `fr-CA`).","schema":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[a-z]{2}(-[A-Z]{2})?(-[A-Za-z]+)?$","example":"es"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Translations resolved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"All translations for a language, organized by namespace.","required":["language","translations"],"properties":{"language":{"type":"string","description":"Language tag.","example":"es"},"totalResults":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number namespace.","additionalProperties":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"string"}},"example":{"auth":{"login.button":"Iniciar 'fr-CA')"}}},"invalid-namespace":{"summary":"Invalid namespace format","value":{"code":"I18N-1002","message":{"key":"error.i18nservice.invalid_namespace","defaultValue":"Invalid namespace format"},"description":{"key":"error.i18nservice.invalid_namespace_description","defaultValue":"The namespace can only contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, and code"}},"title":"I18nMessage"},"description":{"type":"object","description":"Internationalized message with translation key and default value.","required":["key","defaultValue"],"properties":{"key":{"type":"string","description":"Translation key for fetching localized message.","example":"error.i18nservice.missing_language"},"defaultValue":{"type":"string","description":"Default message in English (fallback).","example":"Missing language code"}},"title":"I18nMessage"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"},"example":{"code":"I18N-5000","message":{"key":"error.i18nservice.internal_server_error","defaultValue":"Internal server error"},"description":{"key":"error.i18nservice.internal_server_error_description","defaultValue":"An unexpected error occurred while processing the request"}}}}}}}
>
